dta.Logger¶

Functions

setupLogging(infoLogFilename, debugLogFilename) Sets up the logger.
DtaLogger = <logging.Logger object at 0x02C9A3B0>¶

This is the instance of Logger that gets used for all dta logging needs!

setupLogging(infoLogFilename, debugLogFilename, logToConsole=True)[source]¶

Sets up the logger.

Parameters:
  • infoLogFilename – info log file, will receive log messages of level INFO or more important. Pass None for no info log file.
  • debugLogFilename – debug log file, will receive log messages of level DEBUG or more important. Pass None for no debug log file.
  • logToConsole – if true, INFO and above will also go to the console.
